channel.title: BUG: Unforeseen Consequences, No Switch For Elevator
channel.description:
Another [b]Unforeseen Consequences[/b] bug :'(
When you get to the freight elevator, there is supposed to be a switch at the top of the side ramps.
[b]BM-BUG:[/b] There is no switch at the top of the ramps.
The only switch is one ON the elevator, and it does NOT work ([i]get beep[/i]). (screenshot)
[b]IF I remember correctly[/b] from the original Half-Life, the switch on BM elevator is the one that should be at the top of the ramps. ![BM_Unforeseen_Consequences_Elevator.JPG|690x500](upload://obLwV0JUm99wZ4uW0kDYRBfyJVq.jpeg)

item.title: BUG: Unforeseen Consequences, No Switch For Elevator
item.dc:creator: lexa2
item.description:
tecknode:

After posting this I realized that there are differences in game-play between BM and Half-Life :facepalm: The Half-Life walkthrough I am using does not fully apply to BM.

No offence but IMO using a walk-through to play both Half-Life and/or BM is to spoil one of the most fun parts of the gameplay for yourself. Why do you do it to yourself? Walking through the level maze and treating the game as a big and wonderful puzzle you have to solve IMO is one of the best parts in playing HL and/or BM.

Read full topic
item.source: BUG: Unforeseen Consequences, No Switch For Elevator

item.title: BUG: Unforeseen Consequences, No Switch For Elevator
item.dc:creator: tecknode
item.description:
Tuskin38:

turn around and go in the air vent with the red light. it will take you into that security office and then you can turn on the elevator.

This isn’t a bug.

Thanks.

After posting this I realized that there are differences in game-play between BM and Half-Life :facepalm: The Half-Life walkthrough I am using does not fully apply to BM.

Read full topic

item.title: BUG: Unforeseen Consequences, No Switch For Elevator
item.dc:creator: tecknode
item.description:
Another Unforeseen Consequences bug :’(

When you get to the freight elevator, there is supposed to be a switch at the top of the side ramps.

BM-BUG: There is no switch at the top of the ramps.

The only switch is one ON the elevator, and it does NOT work (get beep). (screenshot)

IF I remember correctly from the original Half-Life, the switch on BM elevator is the one that should be at the top of the ramps.

BM_Unforeseen_Consequences_Elevator.JPG800×600 50.3 KB
